channel.title: OS-Legacy Remake || A Server Meeting Your Needs
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/hJZOoGB.png[/img]
[URL=http://https://www.dropbox.com/s/w3m8eev9ywbtl53/Os-LegacyV1.0.jar?dl=1][IMG]http://puu.sh/5TXtd/030ba065e3.png[/img][/URL][URL=http://os-legacy.invisionzone.com/][IMG]http://puu.sh/5TXt9/469bcd6159.png[/img][/URL]
[COLOR=#00FF00][B][U][SIZE=4] Welcome to The OS-Legacy Remake![/SIZE][/U][/B][/COLOR] [I]OS-Legacy use to be one of the top old school servers out there with one of the best combat. Many people use to play OS-Legacy, but it unfortunately closed down soon. I am here today to announce the remake of the OS-Legacy Server. We want our players to enjoy every single minute that they spend on the server. We have a brilliant development team working the best they can to make sure that you will receive the best gaming experience ever. Our Development Team wants to succeed, and we want you to join us in reaching our success![/I] [COLOR=#FF8C00] [B][SPOILER=Features] Tutorial Island Boss Pets Old School Runescape Items. All Old School Bosses (Zulrah, Callisto, Kraken, etc.) God Wars Dungeon Achievement Diaries (50+) Quick Prayers Bank Tabs Boss & Slayer Kill Logs New Starter Pack Perfect Combat Perfect Switching Iron-Man Mode Legendary Mode Rewritten Duel Arena Barrows Minigame Clue Scroll System - Easy, Medium & Hard (Elite Coming Soon) Pest-Control Minigame 11 Bosses + Godwars Dungeon! All 21 Skills Working! Rewritten Fishing Rewritten Cooking Rewritten Firemaking Rewritten Farming Rewritten Hunter Rewritten Agility Working Slayer & Duo Slayer, with the ability to ask for a boss slayer task. Barbarian Assault Fully working Clan Chat Working Lootshare if a Rare Drop is obtained by a player. Working PvP System (Bounty Hunter Coming Soon).[/B][/COLOR][/SPOILER]
[SPOILER=OS-Legacy Media] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/WWVvTmB.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ZMX1cbV.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/7EwZMTW.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/i0rErCo.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/roxW9Os.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/hhTkK9N.png[/img] [IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/440d03a03873e25cf8c3787f8dbfa4a2.gif[/img] [IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/2c7bb92cd07ac52c9975904eb7c636ba.gif[/img] [IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/750a2a32893775ec9d7482ddd964ec4c.gif[/img] [IMG]https://i.gyazo.com/79fea6fd813e95167640774f0cef1c46.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/bsQsCOU.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/38cWX4m.png[/img] [/SPOILER] [/CENTER]
[SPOILER=Promo Video] [CENTER][URL=https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Mg6LqtjYFAQ]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Mg6LqtjYFAQ[/URL][/CENTER] [/SPOILER]
[CENTER][URL=https://www.dropbox.com/s/w3m8eev9ywbtl53/Os-LegacyV1.0.jar?dl=1][IMG]http://puu.sh/5TXtd/030ba065e3.png[/img][/URL][URL=http://os-legacy.invisionzone.com/][IMG]http://puu.sh/5TXt9/469bcd6159.png[/img][/URL]
[/CENTER]

item.title: OS-Legacy Remake || A Server Meeting Your Needs
item.dc:creator: @Trick_Maulzz Trick Maulzz
item.description:
@Trick_Maulzz wrote:

[CENTER]

[COLOR=#00FF00][SIZE=4]
Welcome to The OS-Legacy Remake![/SIZE][/COLOR]
OS-Legacy use to be one of the top old school servers out there with one of the best combat. Many people use to play OS-Legacy, but it unfortunately closed down soon. I am here today to announce the remake of the OS-Legacy Server. We want our players to enjoy every single minute that they spend on the server. We have a brilliant development team working the best they can to make sure that you will receive the best gaming experience ever. Our Development Team wants to succeed, and we want you to join us in reaching our success!
[COLOR=#FF8C00]
[SPOILER=Features]
Tutorial Island
Boss Pets
Old School Runescape Items.
All Old School Bosses (Zulrah, Callisto, Kraken, etc.)
God Wars Dungeon
Achievement Diaries (50+)
Quick Prayers
Bank Tabs
Boss & Slayer Kill Logs
New Starter Pack
Perfect Combat
Perfect Switching
Iron-Man Mode
Legendary Mode
Rewritten Duel Arena
Barrows Minigame
Clue Scroll System - Easy, Medium & Hard (Elite Coming Soon)
Pest-Control Minigame
11 Bosses + Godwars Dungeon!
All 21 Skills Working!
Rewritten Fishing
Rewritten Cooking
Rewritten Firemaking
Rewritten Farming
Rewritten Hunter
Rewritten Agility
Working Slayer & Duo Slayer, with the ability to ask for a boss slayer task.
Barbarian Assault
Fully working Clan Chat
Working Lootshare if a Rare Drop is obtained by a player.
Working PvP System (Bounty Hunter Coming Soon).[/COLOR][/SPOILER]

[SPOILER=OS-Legacy Media]

WWVvTmB.png765×508



i0rErCo.png765×502








38cWX4m.png768×507

[/SPOILER]
[/CENTER]

[SPOILER=Promo Video]
[CENTER]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Mg6LqtjYFAQ[/CENTER]
[/SPOILER]

[CENTER]

[/CENTER]
